channel.title: How to edit accounts
channel.description: [size=13pt][center][b]For 701+[/b][/center] Source -> Src -> Org -> Dementhium -> Model -> Player -> PlayerUpdate.java CTRL + F -> Administrator / Owner Name -> Something like this will come up: [code] if (p.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("NAME HERE")) { appearanceData.writeRS2String("Administrator "+Misc.formatPlayerNameForDisplay(p.getUsername())); }[/code] 1. This will change your: - Yell title. - You'll get Administrator / Moderator permissions. - A crown behind your name. [size=13pt][center][b]For 317+ [/b][/center] Source - Characters - Choose Character you want to edit. Should look like this: [code][ACCOUNT] character-username = test character-password = test BankPin = true bankPin1 = 1 bankPin2 = 2 bankPin3 = 3 bankPin4 = 4 [CHARACTER] character-height = 0 character-posx = 3092 character-posy = 3508 character-rights = 3[/code] 1. This will give you: - Administrator / Moderator permissions. - Crown / title behind your name. -NoTy

item.title: How to edit accounts
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“lord0ftacos, post:25, topic:483023”][quote author=Lil_Smok3r link=topic=601256.msg4255489#msg4255489 date=1362682658]
How is this meant to be a Tutorial? How is this in the slightest way hard?! Any person who can’t change rights on a 718 shouldn’t make a server.
[/quote]

isnt the point of this to teach people how to do this which will HELP them make a server…why the hell would someone who knows how to make a server need this? this thread is meant for people who dont have any exp making servers and needs help.[/quote]
You just proved my point… Why would someone who can Java code, need this?

Although i’m hating on it.
Good Tutorial Anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: How to edit accounts
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Despite the fact that

RiiPiiNFtW:

this is stupid

You also did not even explain what each thing stands for.
For example:

[ACCOUNT] character-username = test - This is the character username character-password = test - This is the character password (most of the time, it is encrypted)

BankPin = true - This means that the character currently has an active bank pin
bankPin1 = 1 - Bank pin #1
bankPin2 = 2 - Bank pin #2
bankPin3 = 3 - Bank pin #3
bankPin4 = 4 - Bank pin #4

[CHARACTER] - Character info
character-height = 0 - Level of height, in terms of upstairs or downstairs or floor level
character-posx = 3092 - X-position on the R|S map grid
character-posy = 3508 - Y-position on the R|S map grid
character-rights = 3 - Current player rights. In most cases, 0 stands for player, 1 stands for mod, 2 stands for admin, 3 stands for owner rank


Also,
runescape sucks:

It’s just common knowledge.

Read full topic
